Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-55130 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-55130 affecting package nodejs for versions less than 20.14.0-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs is earlier than 20.14.0-12, affected by CVE-2025-55130
